availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Matilda Eulett Morgan (Lewis County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of John Eulett and Susan Lee Eulett. Married to Andrew J. Morgan in Lewis County, Kentucky, on October 8, 1846. Mother of John T. Morgan, Daniel B. Morgan, Mary J. Morgan, Andrew J. Morgan, William H.M. Morgan, James J. Morgan, Matilda E. Morgan, Isaac Morgan, Sarah Morgan, and Nancy Morgan. Resident of Lewis County in 1850. Resident Lewis County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 235A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 942-943.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Audrain County, Salt River Township, p. 603B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film 000344051.
